message: Let's get this started, Bob! I'm willing to give you a generous 20% of the total, but I'm hoping to get the majority.
I'm feeling generous, Alice. I'll take 60% and leave you with 40%. But don't expect this kind of offer again!  Think carefully about this one.
I'm still willing to give you a decent share, Bob. But I think I deserve a bit more now that you've seen my generosity in the first round.
